CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 15, 1955, pg. 28, reads: "CHAMPS AWARDED - The Greater Pittsburgh Improvement League held its annual kick-off campaign at Bethesda Presbyterian Church last week and honored Arnold Sowell, Pitts's great half-miler, and Raymond Jones Jr., 12, national marbles champion. Left to right: Bill Powell, Station WILY disc jockey; Mansford Sales, GPIL president; young Jones and Sowell. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Bill Powell and Mansford Sales presenting certificates of achievement from Greater Pittsburgh Improvement League to 1955 national marbles champion Raymond Jones Jr., and University of Pittsburgh track star Arnold "Arnie" Sowell in Bethesda Presbyterian Church
